headline: JCP&L Meeting Explosive Growth with Multi-Pronged Ocean County Plan
summary: Jersey Central Power & Light (JCP&L), a FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE:FE) electric company, is investing $108 million through 2028 to bolster the electric grid in rapidly growing Ocean County, New Jersey. The company is making updates to the power system to make it more dependable, fix outages more quickly and provide enough electricity to keep pace with the county's surging energy demands.

content.title: JCP&L Meeting Explosive Growth with Multi-Pronged Ocean County Plan

thumbnail.caption: JCP&L is investing more than $100 million in electrical grid upgrades in Ocean County, NJ.
